fees.description: Connection fee (GST incl) for standard move in requests during business hours. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.
Disconnection fee (GST incl) generally applies for any move-out request. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.

gasContract.terms: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Allgas Energy (NSW) distribution zone. Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer.
gasContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Customer Charter and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business day prior to the variation.

incentives.description: Get 5,000 bonus Qantas Points when you pay your first gas bill in full, and 2 Qantas Points per $1 on every gas bill when you pay on time. For T&Cs see redenergy.com.au/terms

Offset Gas is certified by Climate Active and is an opt-in natural gas product charged at an additional rate of 0.242 cents per MJ inc GST to your standard gas usage charges and may be varied or ended by notice under relevant laws. For more information visit www.redenergy.com.au/offset-gas.

eligibility.description: This offer is only available to new customers
Available to valid Qantas Frequent Flyer members only

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us
gasContract.additionalFeeInformation: The fees and charges listed in the Fees and Charges section above apply to the standard move in and move out requests. For details on our additional fees and charges, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/additional-service-charges-nsw or contact us on 131 806.
